Text:
function ERU_EP05_11()
    -- .承-2【2月第1週】「姫神ネメシアの天敵」
    SaveData.Title = "姫神ネメシアの天敵"

    -- //BG：姫神邸門
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG005ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,200)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ネメシア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0193.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Oh my. What brings the sisters gathering together like this~?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0194.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Ah! Was it siblings, was it? Hyahahaha!" ]])

    MSG([[ I waited in ambush with Marika-neesan in front of the mansion for Nemesia-san. ]])

    MSG([[ Even after the board meeting, the only moment she would let her guard down—was just before going home. ]])

    MSG([[ With the cooperation of Mask Senpai and the others, we grasped her returning time and finally managed to seize an opportunity for direct negotiation. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG005aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0071.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Nemesia-san, I have a proposal for you today." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0195.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "A proposal? From you to me? Interesting, do tell~?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0072.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "In the next Princess Election, Erika-chan will face off against Hermes-chan. How about the loser agreeing to fulfill one demand from the winner?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0196.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "...Haa~n? So, you mean the loser must obey the winner's orders? I suppose you want to stop the shift to coeducation, but that’s not a proposal I could possibly accept~" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0197.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "The coeducation is progressing very smoothly~. Besides, there’s no need to rush results in this Princess Election. We have no benefit in facing you head-on." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "You sure love your lies, Nemesia-san." ]])

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan dismissed Nemesia-san’s remarks with a smile. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Claiming there’s no benefit is a lie. You must be desperate for us to switch to coeducation." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0075.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Hermes-chan will graduate soon and has to resume her entertainment activities. Your influence at Yuriai Private Academy will weaken considerably." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0076.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "And I will obviously repeat a year because of insufficient attendance. Of course, next year I will resist coeducation as part of the conservative faction." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Through Hermes-chan, you can freely intervene in the school now. This is your only chance to forcibly realize coeducation." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0078.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Well... I hear Hermes-chan is recuperating at home, so it’s understandable she would try to dodge the match." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0198.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "...You, little brat." ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia-san’s expression, once full of confidence, now showed a hint of hostility. Even I could see that Marika-neesan’s words had struck true. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0199.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "You’re still a troublesome one. Wouldn’t it have been better if you had stayed asleep for another month~?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0079.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Heh. I wanted to oversleep too, but the buzzing of pests plaguing my beloved school woke me up." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0080.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Remember this. Yuriai Private Academy is not your plaything." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0200.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Very well. I suppose I’ll accept your proposal~?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0201.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "I’m looking forward to seeing your cute little sister succumb to my Hermes~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0081.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Then let’s shake on it. Based on Yuriai Private Academy’s ideals, let’s compete fairly in cuteness." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0202.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Yes, fairly, indeed~" ]])

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan and Nemesia-san shook hands with smiles. Their expressions were calm, but the tension was enough to send chills down my spine. ]])

    MSG([[ Thus, the Princess Election between Hermes-san and me was decided to take place. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_12")
end
